description:
Download web video and audio


This update contains fixes for various bugs users were experiencing.
Full Changelog ðŸ“ƒ
- Improved progress and log reporting of downloads
- Fixed an issue where removing source data from metadata was not working
- Fixed an issue where a media's track number was not included in its metadata for playlist downloads
- Fixed an issue where downloading media with a specified time frame did not work on Flatpak
- Fixed an issue where the postprocessing threads setting had no effect on Flatpak
- Fixed an issue where the video and audio format comboboxes were ellipsed on GNOME
- Updated yt-dlp
